summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 31, S. A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the alley from Pike Street to Pine Street, between 9th Avenue and Terry Avenue, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8934 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
